text: Ebrahim Abadi (, 15 August 1934 â€“ 31 October 2019) was an Iranian actor. Abadi was known for his roles in Mokhtarnameh, On Tiptoes, Dar Chashm-e Baad and Grand Cinema. He was born in Tabriz, Iran. Abadi died on 31 October 2019 at a hospital in Tehran while in a coma after suffering a heart attack at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Iranian actors Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Ebrahim Abadi
